text: Deen ke maamle mein koi zoar zabardasti nahin hai, saheeh baat galat khayalat se alag chaant kar rakh di gayi hai, ab jo koi taagut ka inkar karke Allah par iman le aaya, usne ek aisa mazboot sahara thaam liya jo kabhi tootne wala nahin, aur Allah ( jiska sahara usne liya hai) sabkuch sunne aur jaanne wala hai
